name: Sivareena S.L.

people_also_viewed.name: Novella Maria Lawrence
people_also_viewed.about: Vice President - Group Alliances & Corporate Communications at Neuberg Diagnostics

people_also_viewed.name: Sharad Bharadva
people_also_viewed.about: Digital Supply Chain | Product Management | Data Lake Analytics | Agile Projects | Strategy | Marketing

recommendations: Pankaj Baruah “Sivareena has been working with me for more than an year now. If there is a situation where I need an opinion about the dots that need to be connected, she is the go-to person. Sivareena is very analytical and methodical in her tasks with professional maturity beyond her years. An ability to see the bigger picture and plan/execute a solution with long term results is a key forte that Sivareena possesses and she just keeps getting better at it. No wonder we could not help but expand here portfolio within an year of her joining us. I wish her best for the career ahead and hope to see her scale pinnacles of achievements.”

Sriram Somayajula “An analytical and dedicated individual, Sivareena is an awesome colleague to work with. Calm and composed, she became the backbone for inventory management in Furlenco; her efforts in creating and managing a tool that improved inventory visibility are really praise worthy. I would specifically commend her ability to understand complex issues that impact the Company at multiple levels. I am sure she will go places...”

volunteer_experience.info: Mentored and guided 5 first year undergraduate students in academic and personal perspective.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Student Welfare Group, IIT Kharagpur
volunteer_experience.title: Mentor

volunteer_experience.info: Taught Maths and English to underprivileged children of rural Medinapur, India and initiated Plastic free campaign for the campus (2011)
volunteer_experience.subtitle: National Service Scheme
volunteer_experience.title: Member
